DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect hyperbaric oxygen therapy ( HBOT ) wind healing , inflammation index , glycemic control , amputation rate , survival rate tissue , bacterial wound culture , quality life ( QOL ) diabetic foot ulcer ( DFU ) patient diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy Diabetics With Chronic Foot Ulcers Improvement Quality Life
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVE - This study evaluate effect hyperbaric oxygen therapy ( HBOT ) wind healing , inflammation index , glycemic control , amputation rate , survival rate tissue , bacterial wound culture , quality life ( QOL ) diabetic foot ulcer ( DFU ) patient diabetes . RESEARCH DESIGN AND METHODS - This study randomize , single-center clinical trial . The effect HBOT patient experimental group compare control group receive routine care . HBOT carry hyperbaric chamber 120-min per session , five day week four consecutive week ( 20 treatment session ) . Data collect 4 segment : pre-treatment ( first administration HBOT ; T1 ) , treatment ( tenth administration HBOT ; T2 ) , post-treatment ( twentieth administration HBOT ; T3 ) , treatment follow-up ( two week last therapy end ; T4 ) .
DOC.criteria: 20 year age history diabetes diagnosis diabetic foot wound classification Grade 3 clear conscious willing participate study sign consent form less 20 year age , unwilling participate
